Question: This person has called the group "a bad jazz band"; Becker and Fagen later founded the successful group Steely Dan.
Hints: In later years, this person met and became friendly with President Ford.
This person starred in the NBC sitcom Community, as aging moist-towelette tycoon Pierce Hawthorne, whom he has played since 2009.
In a 2007 biography, this person claims that he was abused as a child by his mother and stepfather, John Cederquist.
